title: Inconsistent architecture naming in comment vs command parameter
problem: The comment says "x86_64 Optimize the full build:" but the actual command parameter is `--asm_type x8664`. Users may be confused and try to use `--asm_type x86_64` which would fail.

title: Inconsistent architecture naming in Chinese comment vs command parameter
problem: The Chinese comment says "x86_64优化全量构建：" but the actual command parameter is `--asm_type x8664`. Users may be confused and try to use `--asm_type x86_64` which would fail.

title: Missing punctuation mark in Chinese documentation
problem: Line 28 is missing a semicolon or period at the end, while all other items in the list end with a semicolon.
code:
- 传统证书能力：支持X509解析验证，CRL解析验证，CSR请求生成，部分/全部证书链生成验证
   - PKCS7，PKCS8，PKCS12等；
fix:
- 传统证书能力：支持X509解析验证，CRL解析验证，CSR请求生成，部分/全部证书链生成验证；
   - PKCS7，PKCS8，PKCS12等；
